improvement: Based on the overall feedback and the tools that were selected, I noticed that our tool Trueway geocoding was often not the first choice. Upon reviewing the usage statistics and sample questions, I realized that we are competing with well-established APIs that offer more concise and user-friendly interfaces such as goapis_geocoding_api.geocding and geocode___forward_and_reverse.forward_geocode. Despite offering accurate results and a wide range of support features like Trueway Alternative is offering we need to improve our tool name and description to be more appealing and easy-to-use for development use cases. In order to make this, I will try to refine the tool name and description while providing the most accurate and fast results as our top priorities.
name: trueway_alt
